Package eu.kartoffelquadrat.tigerencryption.otpgenerator

Class OneTimePad

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.kartoffelquadrat.tigerencryption.otpgenerator.OneTimePad
  • public class OneTimePad
extends Object
    Immutable implementation of One Time Pad object. Cannot be changed once created. The one time pad holds a series of chunks which are meant for single encryption use by a given communication party.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getChunkAmount()
      Getter to look up size per chunk in this one time pad.
      byte[] getChunkContent​(int chunkId)
      Protected access to the contents of one specific chunk.

      Getter to look up size per chunk in this one time pad.

    • Method Detail

      • getChunkAmount

        public int getChunkAmount()
        Getter to look up size per chunk in this one time pad. All chunks have identical size.
        Returns:
        integer telling the amount of chunks held in one time pad.

      • getChunkSize

        public int getChunkSize()
        Getter to look up size per chunk in this one time pad. All chunks have identical size.
        Returns:
        integer telling the amount of bytes per chunk.

      • getChunkContent

        public byte[] getChunkContent​(int chunkId)
        Protected access to the contents of one specific chunk.
        Parameters:
        chunkId - as index of the target chunk in the One Time Pad.
        Returns:
        byte array holding copy of requested chunk contents.
